name: Multi-Game
description:
this was made for the  Mix and Jam Game Jam 2020

the theme was mixing genres 

so i made a game where you have to win in three genres:

      Racing, Platformer and Pong 

when you hit Space Bar you switch between the three genres 

the art was made by kenney.nl

thanks for playing!!! and check out my other games :

MAYUR GAMES
